channel.title: Raspberry Pi on Metricio - Dashboards for teams built with React and Node
channel.description: Recent content in Raspberry Pi on Metricio - Dashboards for teams built with React and Node

item.title: Setup
item.description: Step 1: Install Raspbian Use the official docs to help you install Raspbian. But it’s more than likely that your Pi already has a boot image on the SD card that came with it. So, power it up and see if you get something like below: Step 2: Configure Raspbian Once booted up and on the desktop of Raspbian, we need to set the Locale, Timezone, Keyboard and enable SSH.
